channel.title: Plots on Lahvak's Sample Space

item.title: Visualize complex continuing fractions with Julia
item.description: I was sitting on this for few years now, using it as an example in a couple of seminar talks, but not really doing anything with it. It seems like a good candidate for a first post on my new blog. Complex Domain Coloring A long time ago I ran across a website created by Frank Farris and Jeffrey Hoffstein, that showed some awesome images of automorphic functions created using a method for visualizing complex functions of complex variable called Complex Domain Coloring.
